snippet.title: Kotlin Messenger 04: Super Fast Groupie RecyclerView and New Messages
snippet.description:
Our app is starting to take shape here, let's build upon our registration screen by including the activity that shows the latest messages.  In addition we'll create the activity that helps us select a user when composing a new message.  Because most of our screens will be lists, we'll use Groupie to help us create our adapter object much easier.  Enjoy.
